identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

rules: Use 'Inter' for all body text, tables, and data.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for transaction IDs, codes, and financial figures where alignment matters.
Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing ('tracking-widest').

gradients.primary_gradient: None. Use solid colors for authority.

usage: Text: High contrast #0F172A for headings, #64748B for secondary text
NEVER use gradients for text or backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.

grid_system.dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 (The Control Room Grid)

rules: Dashboard widgets must fill their grid cells (h-full).
Use 'subgrid' behavior where possible for aligned internals.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-all

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-medium py-3 px-4

images.description: Modern minimalist office space, bright and professional.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' if a specific weight/style is needed for marketing.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500) on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install necessary fonts (Outfit, Inter, JetBrains Mono) via Google Fonts in index.css.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' palette defined above.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'DashboardLayout' component with a collapsible sidebar and top navbar.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components (Card, Button, Input, Table) to match the 'Swiss' aesthetic (sharper corners, high contrast borders).
5. PAGES: Implement the Dashboard Overview first, using the 'Control Room' grid.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts for data visualization. Style them to match the palette (Emerald for growth, Red for loss).
7. LANGUAGE: Ensure all text is in BAHASA INDONESIA as requested.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly (only for sticky headers/overlays).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
